title: Find where a tangent line has a particular slope

content.prompt: The function f is defined by f ( x ) = x x + 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4197@ . What points ( x , y ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D6E@ on the graph of f have the property that the line tangent to f at ( x , y ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D6E@ has slope  1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE0@ ?

choices.label: ( 1 2 ,   1 5 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FA3@  only

( 0 , 0 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CE7@  and ( âˆ’ 4 , 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DDA@

( 0 , 0 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CE7@ and ( 4 , 2 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DF8@

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
